content: I'm actually really curious about the festival's atmosphere and community. I've heard it's a great event for meeting like-minded people who are passionate about LGBTQ+ cinema and storytelling. I'm also interested in seeing the types of films that are showcased, especially if they're not typically represented in mainstream media. As someone who's interested in film and storytelling, I think it would be a great experience to be surrounded by people who share similar interests and passions.
